name: AMERICAN DENTAL ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: H.R. 1625, Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2018, H.R. 1892, Bipartisan Budget Act of 2018 and issues related to military dental research funding.
Monitor implementation of H.R. 1, The Tax Cut and Jobs Act, as it relates to small businesses. Issues related to the medical device excise tax and limitations on contributions to FSAs.

H.R. 1606, The Dental and Optometric Care Access Act. H.R. 2422, Action for Dental Health Act of 2017 and issues regarding access to dental services. S.2315, Over-the-Counter Drug Safety, Innovation, and Reform Act; H.R.5333, Over-the-Counter Monograph Safety, Innovation, and Reform Act of 2018 and issues related to over the counter medications. H.R. 4894, The  Harmful Tax Prevention Act.
Issues regarding Medicare enrollment for dentists who provide prescriptions for Medicare beneficiaries. Issues concerning opioid prescribing.
H.R. 1625, Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2018, H.R. 1892, Bipartisan Budget Act of 2018 and issues related to medical dental research funding and access to dental services.

Issues concerning opioid prescribing.
